architectural_notes: Provide an in-project admin/submissions view for contact form entries (a 'Data'/'Submissions' area or equivalent) so messages can be accessed without email notifications.
known_issues: Current contact form exists on the site but does not work yet; submissions are not accessible via an admin/submissions panel.

existing_features.title: Make the existing website contact form save each submission in the backend and return a successful response to the frontend so the user sees the success state after submitting.
Add an in-app admin page (admin panel) that allows an admin user to view contact form submissions stored in the backend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Make the existing contact form functional so submissions are stored and viewable in an admin/submissions panel within the project.

Implement reCAPTCHA/spam-handling on the backend submission endpoint by using the provided reCAPTCHA token and the configured minimum score, and store low-confidence or bot-like submissions in the junk submissions collection.

projectName: Store contact form submissions and provide an admin panel to view them
